General.Name: Changzhou Shenli Electrical Machine Incorporated Co
General.Description: Changzhou Shenli Electrical Machine Incorporated Company manufactures and sells motors, generator stator and rotor punching sheets, and iron cores in China and internationally. The company offers diesel generators, wind turbines, medium and high-voltage motor, track motor, elevator motor, AC motor, and micro motor; and DC step motors, AC / DC brushless motors, DC servo motors, etc. for household and commercial applications. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Changzhou, China.

1.Name: Mr. Guo Feng  Jiang
1.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
